originalText.text: I am the organist at Great Kills Moravian Church on Staten Island.   The United Chancel Choir came to Staten Island and presented inspirational music/anthems to celebrate the installation of our new pastor Sister Blondel.  It was an honor to accompany them and I look forward to hearing them again.   Thank you all for your singing.

text.text: I am the organist at Great Kills Moravian Church on Staten Island.   The United Chancel Choir came to Staten Island and presented inspirational music/anthems to celebrate the installation of our new pastor Sister Blondel.  It was an honor to accompany them and I look forward to hearing them again.   Thank you all for your singing.

originalText.text: Wonderful group of people who are incredibly generous. My husband and I were walking by as we live in the area and they offered us both an incredibly generous care package that included more than I could ask for, enough to feed 4 people and on top of that offered us clothes and something for kids if we had any. We wish to return the same kindness. Thank you and have a lovely Christmas.

originalText.text: Great services, friendly congregation. Annual Prayer Breakfast was an amazing experience - nice breakfast, great singalongs, wonderful sermon...an awesome spiritual event.
